message: I have 2 Localizable.strings files (for now), and after adding new strings to the code I execute genstrings to update the localization file. So far so good, but, How do you manage to update those new keys on the others language files?
Try to use an core data project able to export it as .strings file
There is a great post on "Cocoa with Love" about localization: http://cocoawithlove.com/2011/04/user-interface-strings-in-cocoa.html

@tibo great post, really. Even though I'm looking for ideas on how to manage .strings files in time, when new keys are added to the code. Something that can easily detect newest entries on the "main" .strings file and add them to the others .strings files already translated.
maybe you should think about a custom development able to manage these files?
Have a look at translationWizard: http://www.moewes.net/translationWizard
